Class ErsatzRequestWithContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stehno.ersatz.impl.ErsatzRequest

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Request, RequestWithContent
    public class ErsatzRequestWithContent
extends ErsatzRequest
implements RequestWithContent
    Ersatz implementation of a Request with request body content.

      • decoder

        public RequestWithContent decoder​(java.lang.String contentType,
                                  java.util.function.BiFunction<byte[],​DecodingContext,​java.lang.Object> decoder)
        Description copied from interface: RequestWithContent
        Specifies a custom body content converter function. The function will have the client request body content as a byte array and it will be converted into the specified output type. Generally the conversion is used when comparing the client request with the configured request body expectation.
        Specified by:
        decoder in interface RequestWithContent
        Parameters:
        contentType - the content type that the convert will handle
        decoder - the conversion function
        Returns:
        a reference to this request

                                java.lang.String value)
        Description copied from interface: RequestWithContent
        Configures an expectation matching parameters contained in the request body. The specified value must exist in the list of parameters for the provided key.
        Specified by:
        param in interface RequestWithContent
        Parameters:
        name - the parameter name
        value - the expected parameter value
        Returns:
